name: Grandma’s Gingersnaps
description: Savour the timeliness delight of Grandma’s gingersnaps – every bite’s a sweet journey to the past. We’ve got the best blend of warming, aromatic spices for you to whip up a batch and spread the joy with friends and neighbours; these cookies make for the perfect heartwarming treats to brighten their day.
preparation: Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses, mix thoroughly, then add egg and mix again.
Sift next 4 ingredients. Add to creamed mixture.
Form cookies into 3⁄4" balls. Roll in granulated sugar. Place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Flatten slightly with the back of a spoon. Bake for 10 minutes.
